title: Standalone dev mode for the Hello app

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
Add a standalone dev mode to `packages/app-hello` so developers can work on it independently, without running the shell. This is a simple HTML page (or React root) that mounts all three Web Components side by side, simulating the slot layout.

This mirrors how real app teams will develop: they build and test their app independently, then plug it into the shell (or any host) via the manifest.

### Acceptance Criteria
- `pnpm dev` in `packages/app-hello` opens a standalone page showing all three slot views.
- Changes to the app's components hot-reload in this standalone mode.

### Dependencies
- Story 3.1
